response.overview: Here comes two of SmellBad's BLASTIEST stars in their first full length vlog-movie feature: Flhorrida! It's the story of two stupid Blastards- Charlie, and Phil. It's spring, and those hard Blastards have big plans; and no second thoughts to stop them! It's a classic power Blast of nonstop hate, headed for success. It's an obnoxious, painful adventure that proves it's easy to Blast when your theme parks are bad! An unforgettable story that will rupture your heart. It's Charlie and Phil to the restroom in SmellBad's live-action animated classic: Flhorrida!
response.tagline: Step inside the mysterious shop of Cecil and Cloyd. You might just find the perfect gift for your loved one... It's Flhorrida!
